AnalyserNodeFrequencyBinCount.summary: The frequencyBinCount read-only property of the interface contains the total number of data points available to . This is half of the value of the . The two methods' indices have a linear relationship with the frequencies they represent, between 0 and the Nyquist frequency.
AnalyserNodeFrequencyBinCount.value: An unsigned integer, equal to the number of values that and copy into the provided TypedArray.For technical reasons related to how the Fast Fourier transform is defined, it is always half the value of . Therefore, it will be one of 16, 32, 64, 128, 256, 512, 1024, 2048, 4096, 8192, and 16384.
